ing: 8 ounces frozen acai pulp (such as Sambazon Â®
1/2 cup granola, or more to taste
des: "A thick acai smoothie blended with orange juice, papaya, and bananas, poured into a half a papaya, then topped with granola and sliced bananas. Add any other fresh fruits you wish! An extremely healthy breakfast or treat!"
ins:
Halve and seed papaya. Scoop out a little extra meat to create a bowl shape.
Blend 1 banana, acai pulp, and orange juice together in a blender until smooth; divide mixture between papaya bowls and top with granola and remaining 1/2 banana.
